verses.verse: וּמַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> And when the queen שְׁבָ֗א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba שֹׁמַ֛עַת <S%H8085><s%> heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥מַע <S%H8088><s%> of the fame שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> concerning the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> she came לְנַסֹּת֖וֹ <S%H5254><s%> to prove בְּחִידֽוֹת׃ <S%H2420><s%> him with hard questions

וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> And she came יְרוּשָׁלְַ֗מָה <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem בְּחַיִל֮ <S%H2428><s%> train כָּבֵ֣ד <S%H3515><s%> great מְאֹד֒ <S%H3966><s%> with a very גְּ֠מַלִּים <S%H1581><s%> with camels נֹשְׂאִ֨ים <S%H5375><s%> that bare בְּשָׂמִ֧ים <S%H1314><s%> spices וְזָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> gold רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> much מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> and very וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <S%H3368><s%> and precious וַתָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and when she was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> she communed אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was in לְבָבָֽהּ׃ <S%H3824><s%> with him of all that was in her heart

וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> told לָ֥הּ שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרֶ֑יהָ <S%H1697><s%> her all her questions לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> there was not [any] thing נֶעְלָ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> hid מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> from the king אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֦א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> which he told לָֽהּ׃

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> had seen מַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> And when the queen שְׁבָ֔א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> wisdom שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> all Solomon's וְהַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the house אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he בָּנָֽה׃ <S%H1129><s%> that he had built

וּמַאֲכַ֣ל <S%H3978><s%> And the meat שֻׁלְחָנ֡וֹ <S%H7979><s%> of his table וּמוֹשַׁ֣ב <S%H4186><s%> and the sitting עֲבָדָיו֩ <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וּמַעֲמַ֨ד <S%H4612><s%> and the attendance [מְשָׁרְתֹו כ] (מְשָׁרְתָ֜יו <S%H8334><s%> minister ק) וּמַלְבֻּֽשֵׁיהֶם֙ <S%H4403><s%> and their apparel וּמַשְׁקָ֔יו <S%H4945><s%> his cupbearers וְעֹ֣לָת֔וֹ <S%H5930><s%> and his ascent אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> by which he went up בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become בָ֛הּ ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> there was no more spirit

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> It was a true הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> report אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> that I heard בְּאַרְצִ֑י <S%H776><s%> in mine own land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about דְּבָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H1697><s%> of thy acts וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2451><s%> and of thy wisdom

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶאֱמַ֣נְתִּי <S%H539><s%> Howbeit I believed לַדְּבָרִ֗ים <S%H1697><s%> not the words עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> until I came וַתִּרְאֶ֣ינָה <S%H7200><s%> had seen עֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> and mine eyes וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not הֻגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> was not told לִ֖י הַחֵ֑צִי <S%H2677><s%> [it] and behold the half הוֹסַ֤פְתָּ <S%H3254><s%> exceedeth חָכְמָה֙ <S%H2451><s%> me thy wisdom וָט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and prosperity אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַשְּׁמוּעָ֖ה <S%H8052><s%> the fame אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H8085><s%> which I heard

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Happy אֲנָשֶׁ֔יךָ <S%H376><s%> are your men אַשְׁרֵ֖י <S%H835><s%> happy עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> [are] these thy servants אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these הָֽעֹמְדִ֤ים <S%H5975><s%> which stand לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before תָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> continually הַשֹּׁמְעִ֖ים <S%H8085><s%> thee [and] that hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2451><s%> thy wisdom

יְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> be the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בָּר֔וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> which delighted בְּךָ֔ לְתִתְּךָ֖ <S%H5414><s%> in thee to set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> thee on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאַהֲבַ֨ת <S%H160><s%> loved יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel לְעֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וַיְשִֽׂימְךָ֣ <S%H7760><s%> therefore made לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> he thee king לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and justice

וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> And she gave לַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty כִּכַּ֣ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּבְשָׂמִ֛ים <S%H1314><s%> and of spices הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> great store מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> very וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <S%H3368><s%> and precious לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Never בָא֩ <S%H935><s%> there came כַבֹּ֨שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> of spices הַה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> no more such עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again לָרֹ֔ב <S%H7230><s%> abundance אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתְנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> gave מַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> as these which the queen שְׁבָ֖א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon

וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> Also אֳנִ֣י <S%H590><s%> And the navy חִירָ֔ם <S%H2438><s%> also of Hiram אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> that brought זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> gold מֵאוֹפִ֑יר <S%H211><s%> from Ophir הֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> brought in מֵאֹפִ֜יר <S%H211><s%> from Ophir עֲצֵ֧י <S%H6086><s%> trees אַלְמֻגִּ֛ים <S%H484><s%> of almug הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> plenty מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> great וְאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָֽה׃ <S%H3368><s%> and precious

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצֵ֨י <S%H6086><s%> trees הָאַלְמֻגִּ֜ים <S%H484><s%> of the almug מִסְעָ֤ד <S%H4552><s%> pillars לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> for the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וּלְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and for the king's וְכִנֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3658><s%> harps וּנְבָלִ֖ים <S%H5035><s%> also and psalteries לַשָּׁרִ֑ים <S%H7891><s%> for singers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> in nor בָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> there came כֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> such עֲצֵ֤י <S%H6086><s%> trees אַלְמֻגִּים֙ <S%H484><s%> no such almug וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> in nor נִרְאָ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> nor were seen עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְהַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לְמַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> unto the queen שְׁבָ֗א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶפְצָהּ֙ <S%H2656><s%> all her desire אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁאָ֔לָה <S%H7592><s%> whatsoever she asked מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> alone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> gave לָ֔הּ כְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> bounty הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> her of his royal שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> beside [that] which Solomon וַתֵּ֛פֶן <S%H6437><s%> So she turned וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went לְאַרְצָ֖הּ <S%H776><s%> to her own country הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he וַעֲבָדֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> she and her servants ס

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁקַ֣ל <S%H4948><s%> Now the weight הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that came לִשְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בְּשָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> in one שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> was six מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore וָשֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

לְבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> alone מֵאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> he הַתָּרִ֔ים <S%H8446><s%> Tokahath וּמִסְחַ֖ר <S%H4536><s%> and of the traffick הָרֹכְלִ֑ים <S%H7402><s%> of the spice merchants וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and of all the kings הָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6152><s%> of the Arabs וּפַח֥וֹת <S%H6346><s%> and of the governors הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the country

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred צִנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> targets זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold שָׁח֑וּט <S%H7820><s%> [of] beaten שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [shekels] of gold יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> went עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַצִּנָּ֥ה <S%H6793><s%> target הָאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> to one

וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> And [he made] three מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred מָֽגִנִּים֙ <S%H4043><s%> shields זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold שָׁח֔וּט <S%H7820><s%> [of] beaten שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three מָנִים֙ <S%H4488><s%> pound זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> went עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמָּגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> shield הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> to one וַיִּתְּנֵ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> put הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> them in the house יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon פ

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Moreover the king כִּסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> throne שֵׁ֖ן <S%H8127><s%> of ivory גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6823><s%> and overlaid זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold מוּפָֽז׃ <S%H6338><s%> it with the best

שֵׁ֧שׁ <S%H8337><s%> had six מַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H4609><s%> steps לַכִּסֵּ֗ה <S%H3678><s%> The throne וְרֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> and the top עָגֹ֤ל <S%H5696><s%> [was] round לַכִּסֵּה֙ <S%H3678><s%> of the throne מֵאַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> behind וְיָדֹ֛ת <S%H3027><s%> and [there were] stays מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> side וּמִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> side אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> on either side on the place הַשָּׁ֑בֶת <S%H7675><s%> of the seat וּשְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two אֲרָי֔וֹת <S%H738><s%> lions עֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> stood אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside הַיָּדֽוֹת׃ <S%H3027><s%> the stays

וּשְׁנֵ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲרָיִ֗ים <S%H738><s%> lions עֹמְדִ֥ים <S%H5975><s%> stood שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> there on the one side and on the other upon the six הַֽמַּעֲל֖וֹת <S%H4609><s%> steps מִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> the one וּמִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> side לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> made כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> there was not the like לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4467><s%> in any kingdom
